SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description: Gundead do not flee or negotiate.

Traits.Name: Grave Resistance
Traits.Description: Gundead have resistance to damage while bloodied.

Traits.Name: Aim For The Head
Traits.Description: If a character hits a gundead with a critical hit or a heavy attack, the attack's damage becomes divine against the attack target.
